title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the widget incorrectly triggers multiple redraw events for each visible line.
EB: This issue should be fixed so that there is a maximum of one redraw event for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce this bug, follow the steps below:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
2. Change the text in the widget.
3. Observe the number of redraw events triggered for each visible line.
